definition: to go home to visit one's family
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear
parents-in-law of one's offspring

sentences.english: Nowadays many people have relatives residing abroad, so going abroad to visit relatives has become common.
sentences.chinese: 現在有海外關係的人很多，出國探親變得十分平常。

sentences.english: Her company allows a 10-days home leave every year.
sentences.chinese: 她單位每年允許10天探親假。

sentences.english: Family members accompanying students shall apply for L visa only.
sentences.chinese: 外國留學生的陪讀家屬，應作爲探親者申請L簽證。

sentences.english: People visit relatives and friends with the words "Have all your wishes ".
sentences.chinese: 與話的人探親訪友“有你所有的願望。

sentences.english: Whether or not will your relatives go to UK to visit you ?
sentences.chinese: 你是否準備讓你家人來英國探親？

sentences.english: I was there on business for 3 weeks the first time and went back twice to visit friends.
sentences.chinese: 我在那裏對企業3周的第一次，回去兩次，探親訪友。

sentences.english: Fortunately, there was a doctor in the village that morning, a young man visiting relatives.
sentences.chinese: 幸好的是，那天早上村子裏有個來探親的年輕男醫生。

sentences.english: The manager of our department reported back from home leave last night.
sentences.chinese: 我們部門的經理昨天晚上休完探親假返回報到。

sentences.english: Dorothy's children came from America to visit with the grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 多蘿西的孩子們帶着第三代從美國回來探親。

sentences.english: Every year, I can enjoy three days of home leave.
sentences.chinese: 我每年可以享有三天的探親假。

sentences.english: Is novitiate mixed is exercitation period internal energy enjoyed visit one's family false?
sentences.chinese: 見習期和實習期內能享受探親假嗎？

sentences.english: The worker is mixed in novitiate cannot enjoy inside exercitation period visit one's family false.
sentences.chinese: 職工在見習期和實習期內都不能享受探親假。

sentences.english: A teenage daughter who has been overseas visiting relatives has flown back into Sydney this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 在海外探親的年少的女兒今天下午已經飛回悉尼。

sentences.english: Striking the veteran convened the parade for the opening veterans returning home visit.
sentences.chinese: 韻書召集當年的老兵遊行要求臺灣開放老兵返鄉探親。

sentences.english: I think that we are really focused on seeing our family and friends this holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我想這個假期我們真的全部心思都放在探親訪友上。

sentences.english: I visited my family at the weekend.
sentences.chinese: 我這個週末去探親訪友了。
